bibl.title: A Late-Antique Contract in the Collection of the Australian National University Classics Museum.
bibl.note: Acquired by purchase in 1975 from a London antiquities dealer. On the recto, unpublished Coptic letter to a bishop, possibly Pisenthios of Coptos [to be published separately as part of a project directed by F. CALAMENT and J. VAN DER VLIET to produce an edition of the Pisenthios archive]. Coptite Nome?, late-sixth or seventh century AD.
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Canberra A.N.U. Classics Mus. Inv. 75.01 verso
KELLY Benjamin, A Late-Antique Contract in the Collection of the Australian National University Classics Museum.

Acquired by purchase in 1975 from a London antiquities dealer. On the recto, unpublished Coptic letter to a bishop, possibly Pisenthios of Coptos [to be published separately as part of a project directed by F. CALAMENT and J. VAN DER VLIET to produce an edition of the Pisenthios archive]. Coptite Nome?, late-sixth or seventh century AD.
